Package CAMs

Class Student

java.lang.Object
CAMs.User
CAMs.Student
public class Student extends CAMs.User
The class represents a user in a system or organization who is a student. It extends the `User` class, inheriting basic user information and functionality. Studdents have additional attributes and functionality specific to their role.
Since:
2023-11-25
Version:
3.0
Author:
Jeevika, Mathangi, Teja, Vikaas

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student(String name, String email, CAMs.Schools faculty)
      Constructs a new `Student` instance with the specified name, email, and faculty.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the student.
      email - The email address of the student.
      faculty - The faculty to which the student belongs, represented by an instance of the `Schools` class.

      public CAMs.UserType getUserType()
      Returns the user type associated with this object.
      Specified by:
      getUserType in class CAMs.User
      Returns:
      The user type, which is always UserType.STUDENT.

    • getIsCampCommitteeMember

      public boolean getIsCampCommitteeMember()
      It checks and returns the camp committee membership status for the student.
      Returns:
      true if the student is a camp committee member, false otherwise.

    • setIsCampCommitteeMember

      public void setIsCampCommitteeMember()
      The `setIsCampCommitteeMember` method sets the value as true.
